column4: Hey guys.. I would really like a small simple mp3 player! any recommendations?
ctmjr  has a point, maybe it's not that lite, but it will work with like anything, and it's also currently the best player in my opinion, even though it uses Mono hum
well  Banshee works with most audio and video stuff,  don't know what DAAP is though, but  could Google that
I already noticed that DAAP is enabled so :)
btw is banshee built on rythmbox?
no Banshee uses something called Mono,  which is a kind of port of  Microsoft .NET to Linux,  which is also why some people that use Linux don't like it
ok :) I thought beacause it looks quite like rythmbox
Rythombox is the default player in Ubuntu, but it's also the default for the Gnome desktop environment :)  which Ubuntu is using
yepp but they look almost the same :)
